foam.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a type of soft rubber with a lot of air in it, used in furniture
foam.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a mass of very small bubbles on the surface of a liquid
foam.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The sea was covered in foam.
foam.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a substance which is like a very thick soft liquid with a lot of bubbles in it
foam.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: Firefighters using water and foam are still tackling the blaze.
foam.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The green water splashed and foamed over the rocks.
